fulltext:
Top Jobs for IT People
Applicant for:
Mobile Devs(React Native/iOS/Android)
UNIT Corp
12 June 2019
Công Tân Đào
dctan.fit@gmail.com
Main interests: React Native, Mobile Apps
What skills, work projects or achievements make you a strong candidate for this
position?
- Graduated from IT Honor Program of the University of Science with GPA 8.3/10,
received 03
scholarships for his outstanding academic performance and some awards of IT
competitions.
- 3 years experiences of Mobile Development with 1 year of Android (Java) and about 2
years
of React Native.
"My #1 job is to hire A+ players." - Steve Jobs
itviec.com
08 6681 1397
itviec@itviec.com
Male 
August 27th, 1994 
Vietnam 
(+84) 988 207 108 
dctan.fit@gmail.com    
575/31/24 Cach mang thang tam Street, District 10, 
Ho Chi Minh City 
Tan Cong Dao 
EDUCATION: 
2012 - 2016 
Honors Program 
Faculty of Information Technology, University of Science, Vietnam National University HCMC 
GPA: 8.3/10 
OVERVIEW: 
o Graduated from IT Honor Program of University of Science with GPA 8.3/10, received 03 
scholarships for his outstanding academic performance and some awards of IT competitions.  
o 3 years experiences of Mobile Development with 1 year of Android (Java) and about 2 year 
of React Native. 
o Strong knowledge of Mobile UI/UX design principles, patterns and its ecosystem. 
o Nice, goal-oriented, problem-solving and willing-to-learn. 
SKILLS & ABILITIES: 
• Programming skill 
o Proficient experiences in Java and JavaScript (ECMAScript) 
o Good OOP, Software Analysis and Design 
o Knowledge of the React Native ecosystem, the libraries available for common tasks  
o Familiarity with native build tools, like XCode, Android Studio 
o Ability to write well-documented, clean Javascript 
o Experience with React Native and Android 
o Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements 
• Soft skill 
o Teamwork and collaboration 
o Problem solving and decision making 
o Working under high pressure and multitasking 
o Adaptability to different working environments 
WORKING EXPERIENCE: 
• React Native Developer 
Apr 2017 – May 2019 
M Service JSC – Ho Chi Minh City 
ü MoMo 
MoMo is a FinTech startup that offers a mobile, electronic wallet and payment application 
for iOS and Android devices. Its products help customers in Vietnam make nationwide cash 
transfers, pay more than 100 types of bills, recharge mobile phone accounts, settle personal 
loans, and purchase services such as software license and online game cards, ...  
Position: Developer 
- Improve features and Optimize performance (layout and bussiness logic) 
- Build A/B testing system and roll-out function 
- Provide the solution to resolve the problems 
- Exchange engineering build the new features 
- Connect back-end and front-end function 
- Monitor and Error handle. 
• Android Developer 
Aug 2015 – Apr 2017 
Ikorn Solutions – Ho Chi Minh City 
o Work in group-based environment 
o Connect back-end and front-end function 
o Design and implement MVC model android applications 
o Work with outside data sources and API’s 
o Implement software that is applicable to diverse Android versions and devices 
o Work side-by-side with design team to create beautiful apps with great UX 
ü Commeet 
Project Description: Come and meet me, now! Quickly find career opportunities wherever 
you want with location-based search. Get automatic recommendations and notifications 
based on your job searches (http://www.commeet.me). 
Position: Android Developer 
Responsibilities: 
- Implement GUI to match with design files 
- Connect front-end component to API, synchronize and cache data 
- Integrate Google Map services, search location 
- Optimize performance, reduce application size 
ü DingDong 
Project Description: DingDong is a fast & multifaceted messaging app. Send messages, 
photos, videos, voice notes and your location for free. Make chatting extra fun with an array 
of emoticons and sticker collections. 
Position: Android Developer 
Responsibilities: 
- Implement GUI to match with design files 
- Build push notification setting 
- Connect front-end component to API, synchronize data 
- Implement Chat interface 
ACHIEVEMENTS & ACTIVITIES: 
• Studying Encouragement Scholarships  
2012 - 2015 
University of Science VNU - HCMC 
• Nokia X Portathon and Hackathon 1st Prize  
July 27th, 2014 
FIT, University of Science VNU - HCMC and Microsoft Vietnam 
• Participation in ACM-ICPC University of Science 
November 2015 
FIT, University of Science VNU - HCMC 
• Semi-final in Thach Thuc Academic Competition 
April 11th, 2016 
FIT, University of Science VNU - HCMC 
• Top 10 final in The 18th Euréka Award 
December 2016 
Center of science and technology development for youth, HCMC 
• Participation in Binh Duong New City Hackathon 
2017 
Binh Duong Province and Silicon Straits Saigon 
LANGUAGES: 
• Vietnamese: native language 
• English: Good in writing and reading, pretty good in listening and speaking 
STRENGTHS: 
• Hard - working 
• Motivated, Independent and Self-discipline 
• Having high responsibility 
• Willing to learn and acquire new knowledge, modern technology 
• Cooperating and taking role as a leadership when it needs
